name: Bearly Surviving
description:
In a world ravaged by global warming*, the icy North Pole you call your home has begun to melt at an alarming rate. You've gathered the last of the surviving polar bears in an attempt to reverse your dismal fate and survive at any cost.

Bearly Surviving is a real-time strategy survival game in which the player battles for survival against the ever increasing threat of extinction. Players must maintain their base of operations while enacting change on the world as a whole in order to stay afloat. 

Please contact us with any questions about development of this title.

Project was developed by Manual Mariscal, Ben Njus, Bianca Ramos, and Maya Hiatt

*The representation of catastrophic events in this game are meant to be comedic and absurd and are in no way meant to accurately reflect real-world science or events.
